{{Wireless embedded system |brand=GlobalScale |model=D2Plug |revision=V5R2 (US Edition) |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |manuf_model=003-D2P001 |price=249 |est_release_date=06/2011 |fcc_date=07/19/2011 |fcc_id=YCJ003-XXXXXXX |type=plug computer |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.25 |pwr_conn=NEMA 1-15P |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88AP510 |cpu1_cspeed=800 |fla1=8 GiB |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=KLM8G2FEJA-A001 |fla2=4 |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX25L3205DM2I-12G |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ2G83BFR-H9C |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=eSATA, USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=3 |expansion_sata_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 8-pin header,, populated,, J15 |serial=yes,, console,, USB Female Micro-B,, (115200 8N1) |wi1_module=AzureWave AW-AH397 |wi1_module_if=SDIO |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8797 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1318 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Audio DAC chip;Realtek;ALC5630;;1;,,, Low-Power 3D HDMI Transmitter;NXP;TDA19988BHN;;1;,,, USB 2.0 High Speed 4-Port Hub Controller;JFD;FE1.1s;;1;,,, USB 2.0 Interface Flash Card Reader Controller;Genesys;GL836;;1;,,, USB to Serial Bridge Controller;Prolific Technology;PL-2303HX;;1;,,, Low Spurious Multiclock Generator for Audio;Asahi Kasei;AK8128;;1;,,, EEPROM Programmable Clock Generator;IDT;IDT5V49EE503;;1;,,, Configurable Multiple-Function Gate;Diodes Inc;74LVC1G97;;1;,,, MicroPower Circuit w/ Manual Reset;Analogic Tech;AAT3528;;1;,,, 1uA Current 150mA LDO Regulator;Eutech Micro;EUP7180;;1;,,, 2A Linear Power Low Dropout Regulator;uPI Semi;uP0109;;1;,,, 12V 4.5A 500kHz Step-Down Regulator;Marvell;88PH845;;4;,,, Low Dropout Regulator;uPI Semiconductor;uP0105;;1;,,, 1MHz Dual Step-down Regulator;Marvell;88PG8227;;1;,,, Dual USB 2.0 Integrated ESD Protection;NXP;IP4223;;7; |flags=HDMI, SD Card slot, Audio in/out (3.5 mm), VGA out, Bluetooth 3.0, eSATA, SPDIF, RTC w/ battery |stock_boot=U-Boot;2009.08;Marvell v5.4.4 NQ; |stock_os=Linux;3.7.10; |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=ubuntu |default_pass=marvell |oui_eth=F0:AD:4E }} :[http://www.globalscaletechnologies.com/p-53-d2-plug.aspx Product page]
===Links=== *[https://liliputing.com/globalscale-d2plug-is-a-handheld-sized-arm-based-desktop-pc-for-249/ ''Globalscale D2Plug is a handheld-sized, ARM-based desktop PC'' on '''Liliputing'''] *[https://linuxdevices.org/linux-android-mini-pc-debuts-hd-ready-marvell-pxa510-soc/ ''Linux/Android mini-PC debuts HD-ready Marvell PXA510 SoC'' on '''LinuxDevices'''] *[https://www.linuxfordevices.com/news/globalscale-technologies-d2plug-and-marvell-pxa510 ''Globalscale Technologies D2Plug and Marvell PXA510'' on '''Linux for Devices'''] *[https://www.engadget.com/2011-05-16-globalscale-d2-plug-offers-hd-video-3d-graphics-in-little-linux.html ''Globalscale D2 Plug offers HD video, 3D graphics'' on '''Engadget''']
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88AP510 @800MHz ARM v7 (PJ4 core) *GPU: ''Vivante GC600'' (OpenGL 3.0, OpenGL ES 2.0, OpenVG) *Storage: 8GB eMMC, 4MB Serial Flash, SD Card, eSATA port *Memory: 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *Wi-Fi: 802.11abgn + Bluetooth 3.0 *USB: 2x USB 2.0 (Host) ports, :1x USB Micro-B Device port *Power: 100-240V AC
==Images== <gallery> File:GlobalScale D2Plug Top.jpeg|Board Top File:GlobalScale D2Plug Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom File:GlobalScale D2Plug SD Board Top.jpeg|SD Board Top File:GlobalScale D2Plug SD Board Bottom.jpeg|SD Board Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
